basics.name: Hari Kumar, Gurudu
basics.label: Full Stack Javascript Developer
basics.summary: I am pursuing Masters in Computer Science at Otto-Von-Guericke University,Magdeburg. I am flexible and quick to pick up new skills. I love learning new technologies and harnessing technologies to make new and exciting things. I also have lots of ideas and enthusiasm.

work.summary: I worked as a front-end web developer,for web based scientific reporting app,SciFlow. I also had experience in testing with Jasmine and Protractor. During the internship, I have succeessfully coped with fast-paced Agile software methodology, SCRUM. In this role, I have been exposed to enterprise Agile development tools: Confluence and JIRA , version control :GitLab.
Here my job was on two areas, front-end development and Software development for embedded systems projects.
highlights: Front-end development: Designed Mock-ups, added new features and updated the old ones for the company’s website using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and other javascript librabries like Jquery etc
Software development for various embedded projects like sun tracking solar system to agricultural farming, which includes ARM-based as well as 8-bit microcontrollers
